title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Advanced Practical Skills Using Digital Learning Objects for Research Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Explaining research design processes with 90% accuracy using ADDIE model-based digital learning objects
Comparing strengths/weaknesses of mixed research methods (qualitative + quantitative) and presenting 80% applicable solutions to real cases
Revising and improving research proposal drafts at least three times using formative assessment features of digital learning tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
